page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox setelementclass method

argument.name: value
argument.description: The value of the element(s) in the view box to set the class name of.

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the element in the view box to set the class name of. Must be prefixed with a "#", for example "#button1".

argument.name: className
argument.description: The class name to apply to the element(s).

page.description: Set the class name of element(s) in the view box.
